title: Memoirs of Love - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Models   Modern Day
author: Qing Shan Luo Tuo   青衫落拓
description:
This a story of a woman and man who she loves dearly, they separated due to some unwanted circumstances.

She thinks:

“I don’t know how long will I love Lu Fei, also don’t know how long Lu Fei will like me. But if one day, he doesn’t like me, or I don’t like him anymore, I can accept that fate. But if we meet the moment when we both like each other and can’t be together, I feel it is the stupidest thing.”>
